title: Redeploy guidance + live URL surfacing in UI

requirements.summary: Add a redeploy checklist (frontend-local documentation) so a fresh ICP deployment can be performed reliably.
acceptanceCriteria: A new live version is successfully deployed (no build/deploy failures).
The deployed app loads in the browser and reaches the main UI without runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Document the ICP redeploy workflow for this project (build, deploy, and verification steps), including where to find the resulting production URL after deployment.

Add a small utility that computes the current live app URL from the browser location (with an optional build-time override via env var) so the UI can display/copy a consistent production link after redeploy.

requirements.summary: Surface the active live app URL in the UI in English with an easy copy action.
acceptanceCriteria: The response includes the new/active live URL for the redeployed version.
The URL is clearly labeled as the live/production link.

file_operations.description: Create a small card component that shows a clearly labeled "Live (production) URL" in English and provides a copy-to-clipboard action with a simple success/failure message. Use existing shadcn/ui primitives already in the repo (e.g., Button/Card) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Render the new LiveAppUrlCard on the Help & Support page so users can always find and copy the updated production link after redeploy.
